nodes.title: Handle Pulsar batch message make sure dispatch batch can dispatch correctly
Add Qos1 support for message publish and consume.
Add tlsv1 and tlsv1.1 for default protocols.
Make Netty boss and worker group configurable.
Add IdleStateHandler for proxy and fix IdleStateHandler not working.
Print clientId to the log that can be easy to find out all client actions
[Test] Add consume from topic filter with proxy mode.
Init MQTTProxyExchanger with CompletableFuture and add connAck state.
Add project maintainers [Jiwei Guo, Penghui Li]
Rename receivePublish to publish and log sendPubAck instead of throwing exception.
Fix topic name and add test case.
Move SubscribeTopicsCount related methods from MQTTProxyHandler to MQTTProxyProtocolMethodProcessor
Add createClientIdentifier to generate clientId regularly
Reduce to parse mqtt topic and move method connAck to MqttUtils
Add checkState to log decoder failure instead of swallowing it.
Refactor the structure of release scripts to facilitate CI management
[Doc] Add section for topic name and topic filters.
Fix subscribe with topic filter issues
Add integration tests for single level topic name filter match.
Remove the signature of `throws Exception` for LookupHandler#findBroker
Close proxyService when close protocol handler
[Cherry pick] Cherry pick #87~#95 from master to branch-2.8.0
Add topic name filter support for the mqtt subscribe
[Proxy] Make MoP proxy connect with MoP broker asynchronously
Fix the issue with same client ID and tests.
[Cherry pick] Fix qos1 pubAck action is not executed forever when log level is not debug.
Fix qos1 pubAck action is not executed forever when log level is not debug
Add a Codacy badge to README.md
[Build] Fix the dependencies bug caused by pulsar-broker and testmocks
Updated read me for only MQTT 3.1.1 supported.
Use Github Actions Maven cache to speed up builds
Change Pulsar dependency to be provided
Upgrade project version to 2.8.0 for the master branch
Handle topic name "/" for the mqtt proxy
Correct references to AoP and AMQP -> MoP and MQTT
Reject the connection is the connection with same client ID present.
Add scripts of set-pulsar-version for repo
